title: Projects
text1: We're called Badem Media because there were almonds (in Serbian, badem means almond) on the table when we were trying to come up with a name, believe it or not. What's the reason for that? Because your work is much more important than your name. These are the prominent projects we have worked on. We let them do the talking.
metaDesc: We are proud of every project of ours, both because of the results we've achieved and because of the long-lasting friendships we've created with our clients.
